articles.description: SNK’s Neo Geo Pocket Color versions of two Mega Man arcade games came out originally in 2000 — and now, 22 years later, you can play them on Switch.
articles.content: The Neo Geo Pocket Color versions of two arcade Mega Man games, now on Switch

articles.author: Richard Priday
articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra just tipped for massive 200MP camera upgrade - Tom's Guide
articles.description: Samsung could use a new and improved 200MP camera on the Galaxy S23 Ultra
articles.content: The Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra's main camera has had new details leaked thanks to Twitter tipster Ice Universe (opens in new tab). It's sounding like the next Samsung flagship phone will have an enormo… [+2449 chars]
